name: varia
description: A variable-based design system for WordPress sites built with Gutenberg.

scripts.build:style: node-sass style.scss style.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style.css
scripts.build:style-editor: node-sass style-editor.scss style-editor.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style-editor.css
scripts.build:print: node-sass print.scss print.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r print.css
scripts.build:woocommerce: node-sass style-woocommerce.scss style-woocommerce.css --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 && postcss -r style-woocommerce.css
